item.title: Home 23
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Deluxe
Travel System Everything you need to travel in style with baby Discover now Built lite.
Built strong. Everything you need to travel in style with baby Discover now INTRODUCTION

Overview

Product description

Head out with your little one for a jog with the Strolik in the Arctic style, which features an adjustable canopy with a peek-a-boo window and covered sunroof for protection from theThe handy parent tray includes two cup holders, and the covered compartment above an extra-large storage basket.You can connect your compatible car seat (not included) for a complete travel system, and the lightweight steel frame construction with a trigger-fold easily reduces the stroller to a compact unit for storage or travel.

Product highlights

  • Keep your child out of the sun and wind with the adjustable canopy with a peek-a-boo window and covered sunroof
  • Parent tray includes two cup holders and a convenient, covered compartment above an extra-large storage basket
  • Connect your compatible car seat (not included) for a complete travel system
  • Lightweight steel frame construction with an effortless trigger-fold easily reduces the stroller to a compact unit for storage or travel

Product
Elements WHY US Head out with your little one for a jog with the Strolik in the Arctic style, which features an adjustable canopy with a peek-a-boo window and covered sunroof for protection from the elements. View All Elements

THE KEY

Features

All terrain suitability

As the inventors of the world's first modular stroller, we are pioneers in our industry, setting the standards and trends for the rest to follow.

Safety and Security

Our engineers apply innovative thinking, well thought-through design and vast years of experience to ensure exceptional performance and quality in each one.

Care and Cleaning

Keep your child out of the sun and wind with the adjustable canopy with a peek-a-boo window and covered sunroof

View all features the smartest

Design

Head Barrie A mandatory safety feature required on prams that recline to the flat position, the head barrier has a tab-free zipper See It In Action Easy storage The effortless trigger-fold reduces the stroller's lightweight steel frame to a compact unit for simple travel. See It In Action Room for more The covered compartment, extra-large storage basket and a parent tray with two cup holders help you carry what you need. See It In Action Keep rolling The lockable front swivel wheel, all-terrain bicycle tires and footrest reflectors for low-light visibility help make your jog pleasant and safe. See It In Action see it in

360-Degree

happy customer

User reviews

Great everyday stroller My son loves it. It seems like it's more fun for him. Maybe because of the smoother ride. It's also way more comfortable for my husband and I. Nomore picking up the stroller for uneven sidewalk. It may not be the most expensive jogging stroller but for moms who just want a more Chrissy From Fresno, Ca Fantastic stroller I bought this online and had it shipped to my husband who bought it to Israel for us. I am so happy with it and so is my one year old baby. I love the tray and I love the adult cup holders. I love the big wheels! Sarah From Israel Better than Expected I wanted a stroller for me and my baby that was easy to take around and workout with. I would recommend buying a stroller like this for multiple uses. My older kids are able to help me because it has a wrist strap so it won't get away and moves better in grass, concrete and bumps. Renee760 From Oceanside, CA

The ride of your life

Everything a stroller should be

from $600 – shop now buy it now

Choose model

  • Smart remotely surveillance camera

    $6,56 – $947,62 Select options

  • Organic & Natural

    $6,56 – $947,62 Select options

  • Smart Neck Physical

    $90,00 – $120,00 Select options

Free shipping

Totally free shipping on all baby gear!

Premium quality

Enjoy high-quality products

Customer service

1900 - 123 - 4567
